title: Records related to US Ecology South 1923 Frederick St, Detroit, MI 48211

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following records for the facility US Ecology South located at 1923 Frederick St, Detroit, MI 48211, for the time period 2014-2024.
- All Inspection reports and internal emails regarding such reports.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nina Ignaczak

title: Records pertaining to Air Quality Permit at 13806 Mellon St, Detroit, MI 48217 (Michigan Department Of Environment, Great Lakes, And Energy)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

For the period of 2018-present  pertaining to Air Quality Permit at 13806 Mellon St, Detroit, MI 48217
- Emissions data
- Inspection records
- Complaint records, 
- Documents related to air permitting, including internal emails, modeling studies and reports inclusive of all data and files

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nina Ignaczak
